title: President approves commissioning of helicopters in Pakistan navy
content:
ISLAMABAD, Jan 28 (APP):President Dr Arif Alvi has approved the commissioning of 10 Qatari Sea King helicopters in Pakistan navy.
The helicopters were included in the airborne fleet of Pakistan navy.
The President approved the commission on the advice of the Prime Minister under article 243 of the constitution.
The Qatari air force gave the 10 helicopters to Pakistan navy as a gift.
